author: David Graham
comment: Love this little app. Would it be possible to have the chance to add points on 7 cards instead of just 3. I would like to keep my scores for 7 days in the week

author: Jim Thomas
comment: Love it. Very well done and detailed.  Random roll is a bit well. Not random. But all else is great

reply.author: EXOMUT
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback! I have tried to recreate the dice not being random, but it worked on my testing devices.

Could you contact me? I would like to fix it as soon as possible if there is an error.

Dice: After selecting how many sides the dice has, tap the middle circle to roll or flip the coin.

author: Seventian89
comment: Unable to use with phone. Only player entry shows. Can not access other features. Fix it!! Or provide a phone version  app.

reply.author: EXOMUT
reply.content: Sorry for the trouble. This app is an Android Wear (watch) only counter app as stated in the description. Please apply for a refund if you do not have an Android Wear device. Again sorry for the trouble. We have no plans on making a phone version of the app.

title: Phone
